languages.text: "Подготовка завершена, мой господин". {n}С заметным усилием оторвав взгляд от темного алтаря, скульптор ковыляет к краю балкона.{/n}
"The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Подготовка завершена, мой господин". {n}С заметным усилием оторвав взгляд от темного алтаря, скульптор ковыляет к краю балкона.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

"The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Vorbereitungen sind abgeschlossen, mein Lord." {n}Der Skulpteur kann kaum die Augen von dem dunklen Altar lassen, als er zum Rand des Balkons humpelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Vorbereitungen sind abgeschlossen, mein Lord." {n}Der Skulpteur kann kaum die Augen von dem dunklen Altar lassen, als er zum Rand des Balkons humpelt.{/n}

languages.text: « "Les préparatifs sont terminés, monseigneur. » {n}Peinant à détourner son regard de l'autel sombre, le sculpteur se dandine jusqu'au bord du balcon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « "Les préparatifs sont terminés, monseigneur. » {n}Peinant à détourner son regard de l'autel sombre, le sculpteur se dandine jusqu'au bord du balcon.{/n}

languages.text: “准备工作已经完成，大人。”{n}雕刻师步履蹒跚地走向阳台边缘，几乎无法将他的目光从黑暗的祭坛上移开。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “准备工作已经完成，大人。”{n}雕刻师步履蹒跚地走向阳台边缘，几乎无法将他的目光从黑暗的祭坛上移开。{/n}

languages.text: «Los preparativos están listos, milord». {n}Casi sin apartar la vista del siniestro altar, el escultor se acerca al borde del balcón.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los preparativos están listos, milord». {n}Casi sin apartar la vista del siniestro altar, el escultor se acerca al borde del balcón.{/n}

languages.text: 「我が主人よ、準備が整いました」{n}彫刻家は暗黒の祭壇から視線を逸らすこともままならないまま、よろよろとバルコニーの縁に近寄っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我が主人よ、準備が整いました」{n}彫刻家は暗黒の祭壇から視線を逸らすこともままならないまま、よろよろとバルコニーの縁に近寄っていった。{/n}

languages.text: "Hazırlıklar tamam lordum." {n}Gözlerini karanlık sunaktan güçlükle ayırabilen heykeltıraş, topallayarak balkonun kenarına doğru ilerliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The preparations are complete, my lord." {n}Barely able to take his eyes off the dark altar, the sculptor hobbles toward the edge of the balcony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hazırlıklar tamam, lordum." {n}Gözlerini karanlık sunaktan güçlükle ayırabilen heykeltıraş, topallayarak balkonun kenarına doğru ilerler.{/n}
